mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_korean_lotto_generation_log (numbers, ip, generated_time) VALUES (#{numbers}, #{ip}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_korean_lotto_generation_log ORDER BY generated_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_korean_lotto_winning_log (sequence, day, numbers) VALUES (#{sequence}, #{day}, #{numbers})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_korean_lotto_winning_log ORDER BY sequence DESC
